name: Run Pre-Commit Checks
description: Manually trigger pre-commit checks workflow (migrated from .clinerules/workflows/pre-commit-checks.md)

action.message: Execute pre-commit checks workflow: 1) Install dependencies (pip install black flake8 isort mypy) 2) Run black --check (exclude _version.py) 3) Run isort --check-only (skip _version.py) 4) Run flake8 (exclude _version.py) 5) Run mypy (exclude _version) 6) Fix any issues found. Line length is 100 characters.
